alert.note: Alert for Stephens; Young (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 1:19PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Young and northeastern Stephens Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 119 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crystal Falls, or 14 miles north of Breckenridge, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Breckenridge and Crystal Falls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
